enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a STUN message with a specific type (BINDING_REQUEST vs BINDING_INDICATION).
Both methods involve creating a request message with a specific type (ALLOCATE_REQUEST vs BINDING_INDICATION).
Both methods return a message object (Request vs Indication) that can be used to set attributes and verify message types.
Both methods involve creating a response or indication message that can be used to verify STUN message handling.
